mapper.insert: insert into sys_rule_factor (factor_id, factor_name, factor_exp, display_name, factor_type, operate_type, value_type, save_object, save_field, data_type, default_value, rule_scenes, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{factorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factorExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factorType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{valueType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{saveObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleScenes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_rule_factor set factor_name = #{factorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factor_exp = #{factorExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factor_type = #{factorType,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, value_type = #{valueType,jdbcType=CHAR}, save_object = #{saveObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, save_field = #{saveField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_value = #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_scenes = #{ruleScenes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where factor_id = #{factorId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select factor_id, factor_name, factor_exp, display_name, factor_type, operate_type, value_type, save_object, save_field, data_type, default_value, rule_scenes, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor where factor_id = #{factorId,jdbcType=CHAR}

select factor_id, factor_name, factor_exp, display_name, factor_type, operate_type, value_type, save_object, save_field, data_type, default_value, rule_scenes, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor

select factor_id, factor_name, factor_exp, display_name, factor_type, operate_type, value_type, save_object, save_field, data_type, default_value, rule_scenes, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor where rec_stat='0'

SELECT * FROM sys_rule_factor where 1=1
and factor_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{factorName}),'%')
and display_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{displayName}),'%')
and factor_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{factorType}),'%')
and factor_exp like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{factorExp}),'%')
and operate_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{operateType}),'%')
and rule_scenes like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{ruleScenes}),'%')
and value_type like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{valueType}),'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{recStat}),'%')
